This is a testharness.js-based test.
PASS Echo referrer in ServiceWorker: from a document with the default referrer policy 
PASS url = http://127.0.0.1:8000/fetch/resources/echo, referrer = about:client, policy =  
PASS url = http://127.0.0.1:8000/fetch/resources/echo, referrer = about:client, policy = no-referrer 
PASS url = http://127.0.0.1:8000/fetch/resources/echo, referrer = about:client, policy = no-referrer-when-downgrade 
PASS url = http://127.0.0.1:8000/fetch/resources/echo, referrer = about:client, policy = origin 
PASS url = http://127.0.0.1:8000/fetch/resources/echo, referrer = about:client, policy = origin-when-cross-origin 
PASS url = http://127.0.0.1:8000/fetch/resources/echo, referrer = about:client, policy = unsafe-url 
Harness: the test ran to completion.
